[UIMA-2523] restructuring folders so uimafit has own trunk
[UIMA-2523] restructuring folders so uimafit, which has its own trunk, is directly under sandbox (no need for two trunks)

NO JIRA - Added .gitignore

[UIMA-2522] Rename packages - Renamed package package org.uimafit.component.xwriter in src/main/java - Renamed package package org.uimafit.component in src/main/java - Renamed package package org.uimafit.component.initialize in src/test/java - Renamed package package org.uimafit.factory in src/test/java - Renamed package package org.uimafit.factory.testAes in src/test/java - Renamed package package org.uimafit.factory.testCrs in src/test/java - Renamed package package org.uimafit.factory.testRes in src/test/java - Renamed type locations and packages - Renamed package org.uimafit.spring in src/test/java - Renamed package org.uimafit.spring in src/main/java - Renamed packages in examples

[UIMA-2541] Switch from Sonatype parent POM to Apache UIMA parent POM  https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-2541 - Updated parent POM - Updated SCM information - Removed reference to UIMA Maven repository - Update m2e lifecycle excludes

[UIMA-2538] Replace license header with header used elsewhere in UIMA - Removed legacy LicenseTest - Replaced previous license headers with default UIMA header - Applied copyright header to POM files - Reformatted some comments in POM files - Fixed encoding and formatting in NOTICE file - Updated copyright information in NOTICE file

[UIMA-2554] Change artifact coordinates

[UIMA-2554] Change artifact coordinates

[UIMA-2562]: Downgrade uimaFIT to Java 5 https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-2562 - Changed Java version to 1.5 - Removed @Override annotations for interface methods - Downgraded commons-io to 2.2 (last Java 5 version)
[UIMA-2544] Apply UIMA code style https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-2544 - Added UIMA code style configuration for Eclipse to SVN. This is not covered by Maven/m2e.
[UIMA-2544] Apply UIMA code style https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-2544 - Applied Eclipse's "Format code" function
- Removed .settings from gitignore.

[UIMA-2540] Support legacy uimaFIT annotations in factory methods - Added Eclipse metadata files to gitignore - Added plugin module for legacy uimaFIT 1 support - Extended uimaFIT core module to automatically detect and use the module.
[NO JIRA] Updated svn:ignores

[UIMA-2540] Support legacy uimaFIT annotations in factory methods https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-2540 - Included AnnotationLiteral originally from cdi-api (ASL 2.0) - Added license header to all Java files and POM
[NO JIRA] Removed empty legacy packages
[NO JIRA] Removed empty legacy packages

[UIMA-2587] @ConfigurationParameter - name should default to name of annotated field without class name https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-2587 - Default name is now only the field name - Removed ConfigurationParameterFactory.createConfigurationParameterName() method - Use legacy ConfigurationParameterFactory.createConfigurationParameterName() in test cases in legacy module - Changed legacy module to generate the old default value when the legacy annotation is used

[UIMA-2553] Maven plugin to generate component descriptors from uimaFIT annotations at build time - Write descriptors to ${project.build.directory}/generated-sources/uimafit (configurable) - Ignore unresolved dependencies (probably those out of scope, e.g. in "test" scope) - Add m2e life cycle mapping

[UIMA-2599] Fill description of component and parameters from JavaDoc - uimafit-maven-plugin: Workaround for MNG-5346 to fix build - uimafit-maven-plugin: Added "enhance" mojo - uimafit-maven-plugin: Refactoring to extract common code from "generate" and "enhance" mojo - uimafit: moved some default values to Defaults.java. The Maven plugin can use this to check if a field has a default value or a customized value.
[UIMA-2607] New annotation for component metadata - Added new annotation ResourceMetaData - Added new ResourceMetaDataFactory + test - Added support for this annotation to AE, CR and FC factories

[UIMA-2599] Fill description of component and parameters from JavaDoc [UIMA-2600] Fill vendor, version, etc. from Maven project - uimafit: Removed Defaults class again and moved functionality into ResourceMetaDataFactory - uimafit-maven-plugin: Moved extractor tests to correct package - uimafit-maven-plugin: Fixed ComponentDescriptionExtractor - uimafit-maven-plugin: Do not generate descriptors for abstract classes - uimafit-maven-plugin: Handle certain JavaDoc tags when extracting text

[UIMA-2553] Maven plugin to generate component descriptors from uimaFIT annotations at build time - Disable "generate" goal in incremental builds to reduce performance impact - Disable "enhance" goal on configuration because it does not modify the Maven model

[UIMA-2612] Mark enhanced files to avoid processing them multiple times - uimafit: Added EnhancedClassFile annotation - uimafit-maven-plugin: Add and honor EnhancedClassFile annotation - uimafit-maven-plugin: Log when class is not enhanced or was already enhanced [UIMA-2611] "truncated class" error sometimes during incremental builds - calling ctClazz.toBytecode() before writing in an attempt to work around the "truncated class"
[UIMA-2600] Fill vendor, version, etc. from Maven project - Fixed bug that component metadata was only set if component JavaDoc was available
NO JIRA - Test if array values can be passed to SharedResourceObjects
[UIMA-2553] Maven plugin to generate component descriptors from uimaFIT annotations at build time https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-2553 - Added simple integration test
[UIMA-2525] Add initTypeSystem Support to SimplePipeline https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-2525 - Call typeSystemInit on readers - Added test that typeSystemInit has really been called

[UIMA-2553] Maven plugin to generate component descriptors from uimaFIT annotations at build time https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-2553 - Downgrade commons-io in integration test to be compatible with Java 1.5

[UIMA-2679] Support legacy uimaFIT META-INF location https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-2679 - Changed META-INF location to org.apache.uima.fit

[UIMA-2610] Report and fail build if meta data is missing https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/UIMA-2610 - Added option to generate the report (enabled by default) - Added option to fail if meta data is missing (disabled by default)

[UIMA-2786] Remove deprecated API

[UIMA-3845] Prepare for release version 2.1.0 - Add standard boilerplate - Remove unnecessary/redundant boilerplate from dependencies - Removed passage about Spring Framework is licensed under Apache License, because this is already in the LICENSE - Removed passage inherited from Spring Framework NOTICE about inclusion of subcomponents with separate copyright terms. According to Apache guidelines, all bundled copyright/license/notice information must be aggregated in this file and the accompanying LICENSE file - Removed mention of copyright.txt in section about AnnotationLiteral.java because we only copied this one file and not the whole cdi-api/JBoss distribution. Copyright/author information is present in the AnnotationLiteral.java file and in the present NOTICE file
[UIMA-3776] Delegate AEs no longer serialized to XML after resolving imports on aggregate - Adding a test case
[UIMA-3984] selectCovered documentation does not mention that covering annotation is never part of the result

[UIMA-3024] CASDumpWriter is sensitive to type system changes - Added parameter to sort annotations instead of relying on index order. Disabled by default because it is assumed that client configures index order using type priorities.
